name: Lorelei
description: The Lorelei is a medium-sized fey with enchanting abilities and a captivating presence, characterized by her alluring cunning and charming demeanor.
memorable: Her ability to charm and incapacitate foes while healing herself through her attacks makes her particularly lethal.
goals: To manipulate and dominate her opponents using charm effects and psychic attacks.
relations: Typically encountered in areas near water, where she can utilize her amphibious abilities.
environment: Often found near lakes, rivers, or other bodies of water.
strengths: High Dexterity and Charisma, skilled in deception and manipulation.
weaknesses: Average physical strength limits her direct melee combat effectiveness.
attacks: Employs strategies involving Stunning Glances, Psychic Blasts, and her Corrupted Kiss for necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Alluring Presence, which can incapacitate and charm opponents to move towards her.
senses: Has darkvision allowing her to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
skills: Exceptional skills in Deception, Performance, and Persuasion, all at +8.
additional_information: Immunity to difficult terrain when in water due to Free Water Spirit ability.
Can escape from nonmagical restraints easily with minimal movement.
Regains health equal to necrotic damage dealt through attacks.
spellcasting: Uses psychic magic and charm effects, with abilities that control and incapacitate foes.
test_queries: psychic attack fey with healing abilities
creature that charms humanoids to approach
dangerous fey with stunning glance ability
